activities: Acuity Scheduling is online appointment scheduling with the ability to create custom intake forms to collect information from clients. Information collected may include name, phone, e-mail address, location, and any extra fields asked for. On some pages, you can create an account, update your account and/or make requests. The types of personal information collected at these pages are: First/last name; Company name; Email address; Account password; Credit/debit card information for billing; Billing postal code for verification; Browser information; IP address. How We Use Personal Information We use the information you provide about yourself when placing an order only to complete that order and to provide customer service during the term of your service. We do not share this information with outside parties without your permission.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
